job.template: CURRENT_CONNECTIONS = data("CurrConnections", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: Cache Hits / (Cache Hits + Cache Misses). Under 80% is Red, 80-90% Yellow, above 90% is Green

job.template:
CACHE_HITS = data("*Hits", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["CacheClusterId"])
CACHE_MISSES = data("*Misses", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["CacheClusterId"])
CACHE_RATIO = (CACHE_HITS / (CACHE_HITS + CACHE_MISSES) * 100)

metrics.description: Number of non-expired items evicted to allow space for new writes

job.template: EVICTIONS = data("Evictions", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: Amount of free memory available on the host

job.template: FREEABLE_MEMORY = data("FreeableMemory", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: Amount of swap used on the host

job.template: SWAP_USAGE = data("SwapUsage", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])

CPU_UTIL = data("CPUUtilization", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: The number of successful key lookups

job.template: CACHE_HITS1 = data("*Hits", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: The number of unsuccessful key lookups

job.template: CACHE_MISSES1 = data("*Misses", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: Number of bytes the host has read from the network

job.template: NETWORK_IN = data("NetworkBytesIn", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])

metrics.description: Number of bytes the host has written to the network

job.template: NETWORK_OUT = data("NetworkBytesOut", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["CacheClusterId"])
